start-registration.name: Name
start-registration.check-name: Required field and must contain from 4 to 30 characters
start-registration.check-login: Required field and must contain from 4 to 30 characters
start-registration.check-email: Required field and must match the format xxxx@xxxx.xxxx in Latin
start-registration.check-password: Required field and must include at least one number, the letter of upper and lower case in the Latin alphabet, contain from 8 to 30 characters
